name: Earth Invader (luthfialdihe, rumicchiia, Syahard)
description:
In 30XX, Earthlings received a message from an unknown race of creatures. The creatures say in the message that they will take over planet Earth and make it their own. Thus, the battle in the skies begins as Earthlings try to defend their home planet.

Submitted for IGSI Game Jam 2022

Controls:
> A and D to Move.
> Left Click/Space to Shoot.

Psst: Play the game until the end for a surprise!
